name: Bethesda Softworks Voice File
summary: Learn about .FUZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The FUZ format combines lip sync data and xWMA audio (format similar to .WAV and based on the RIFF container format). It was introduced in Bethesda Softworks' The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and is also used in Fallout 4. You can use the Unfuzer program to create and extract FUZ files.
